parameters.name: group
parameters.description: The group to which the service belongs.

parameters.name: ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the service provider. Fuzzy searches are supported.

parameters.name: origin
parameters.description:
The source of the data. Valid values:

*   agent: Use this value if you use the service query feature of the latest version to pass the query result.
*   registry: Use this value if you use the service query feature of the earlier version to pass the query result.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region ID of the service.

parameters.name: registryType
parameters.description: The type of the service registry. This parameter is deprecated. You can ignore it.

parameters.name: serviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service. This parameter is deprecated. You can ignore it.

parameters.name: serviceType
parameters.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

*   dubbo
*   springCloud
*   hsf
*   istio

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The source of the service. Set the value to edas.
